panels.description: Displays OK vs LOW BALANCE status based on threshold. Shows whether the attestation signer has sufficient STRK balance to continue operations.
panels.title: Signer Balance Status

panels.description: Current STRK token balance of the attestation signer account. Monitor this to ensure sufficient funds for transaction fees.
panels.title: Signer Balance

panels.description: Latest block number seen by the validator on the Starknet network.
panels.title: Starknet Latest Block

panels.description: Displays the first block number of the current epoch.
panels.title: Epoch Start Block

panels.description: The specific block number within the current epoch for which the validator is assigned to attest.
panels.title: Assigned Attestation Block

panels.description: Shows the ID of the current epoch the validator is participating in.
panels.title: Current Epoch ID

panels.description: Visualizes the validator's progress through the current epoch.
panels.title: Epoch Progress

panels.description: Progress towards next attestation duty. Shows how close the current block is to the assigned attestation block for this epoch.
panels.title: Progress to Attestation

panels.description: Blocks remaining until the validator's assigned attestation duty for the current epoch.
panels.title: Blocks Until Attestation

panels.description: Indicates the total length (in blocks) of the current epoch.
panels.title: Current Epoch Length

panels.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds) of the last successful attestation submission, converted to minutes ago.
panels.title: Last Successful Attestation

panels.description: The total number of attestations submitted by the validator since startup.
panels.title: Attestations Submitted

panels.description: The total number of attestations that have been confirmed on the network since validator startup.
panels.title: Attestations Confirmed

panels.description: The percentage of submitted attestations that have been successfully confirmed.
panels.title: Attestation Success Rate

panels.description: The total number of attestation transaction submission failures encountered by the validator since startup.
panels.title: Attestation Failures

panels.description: Trend of total attestations confirmed over time.
panels.title: Attestations Confirmed (Total Trend)

panels.description: Trend of total attestations submitted over time.
panels.title: Attestations Submitted (Total Trend)

panels.description: Time since the last successful attestation was submitted by any validator instance.
panels.title: Time Since Last Attestation Trend

panels.description: Trend of total attestation submission failures over time.
panels.title: Attestation Failures (Total Trend)
